body_html: I can't see how a missing attribute error is less informative than a NonImplementedError. It's not like there's anything in the Module contract that forbids you from adding a .device property. You can always roll it on your own any time.
body_text: I can't see how a missing attribute error is less informative than a NonImplementedError. It's not like there's anything in the Module contract that forbids you from adding a .device property. You can always roll it on your own any time.
body: I can't see how a missing attribute error is less informative than a NonImplementedError. It's not like there's anything in the `Module` contract that forbids you from adding a `.device` property. You can always roll it on your own any time.
